description:
Jam tomorrow, jam yesterday and always jam today. For the tradsters in the crowd, these shoes are built to torque into splitters and milk the potential of tiny incuts and micro edges. The Aspect Pro’s stiff, durable NeoFriction Force rubber is moulded, not cut from a sheet of rubber, for more consistent control of its weight and thickness.

  • Ecco DriTan™ leather uppers are comfortable and durable for all-day cragging
  • Engineered mesh tongue is breathable and comfortable
  • Full-length, stiff midsole provides comfort on long days
  • Mid-height design provides extra ankle protection for crack climbing
  • Rubberized toe box for added durability
  • Moulded BlackLabel Fuse rubber provides confidence and grip on smears and small edges
name: Black Diamond Aspect Pro Rock Shoes - Unisex
